attributes.action: De-select Yvette Cooper MP - Normanton, Pontefract & Castleford
attributes.additional_details:
Yvette Cooper stood on a Labour manifesto to apply the will of the people and her constituents to leave the EU.

Cooper has applied many variants and amendments to frustrate the withdrawal agreement and only today has applied to have no deal applied to the motion by law. She and other members of the Labour Party are playing party politics using their own remains views in order not to act on the will of the people.


Yvette Cooper must be deselected a MP for Normanton, Pontefract and Castleford.
attributes.background:
Remain MP Yvette Cooper has been applying amendments in order to Revoke, Delay and sabotage Leaving the EU.

Normanton, Pontefract and Castleford voted to leave the EU by a majority vote of 69.26%.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it is not something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

The selection of parliamentary candidates is the responsibility of their political party.
